Attribute.Name: AverageCost
Attribute.Description: Average Cost of the item at the ship node.

Attribute.Name: CostCurrency
Attribute.Description: Currency in which inventory cost is maintained.

Attribute.Name: EnterpriseCode
Attribute.Description: Enterprise Code of the transaction. This is just a reference attribute.

Attribute.Name: InventoryValue
Attribute.Description: Total value of the current on-hand inventory for item at the shipnode.

Attribute.Name: ItemID
Attribute.Description: Standard Cost of the inventory item at the ship node.

Attribute.Name: OrderNo
Attribute.Description: Order No of the transaction. This is just a reference attribute.

Attribute.Name: OrganizationCode
Attribute.Description: Organization Code of the organization maintaining the inventory.

Attribute.Name: PrimeLineNo
Attribute.Description: Prime Line No of the transaction. This is just a reference attribute.

Attribute.Name: ProductClass
Attribute.Description: Product Class of the item for which inventory value is adjusted.

Attribute.Name: Quantity
Attribute.Description: Current on-hand inventory for the item at the ship node.

Attribute.Name: ShipNode
Attribute.Description: Ship Node for which inventory item cost is maintained.

Attribute.Name: SubLineNo
Attribute.Description: Sub Line No of the transaction. This is just a reference attribute.

Attribute.Name: UnitCost
Attribute.Description: Standard Cost of the inventory item at the ship node.

Attribute.Name: UnitOfMeasure
Attribute.Description: Standard Cost of the inventory item at the ship node.
